title: The.Counterfeiter.2007.avi.avi
description:
Absolutely superb film.

single avi file with subtitles already hard coded into film.

No messing about with Rar files, no messing about splicing subs into it yourself.
The creator of subs is not english, so be prepared for some spelling mistakes.

Set in WW2 A professional counterfeiter (a jew)is sent to prison camp and (without giving the plot away too much) is set to work producing money for the German war effort.  Moral Dilemmas ensue, powerful scenes throughout & great acting makes this subtitled film well worth the watch.





I took the Rar-d file from a private torrent - took forever to get, im passing on to TPB-ers without all the kerfuffle i had, so please make sure you seed it.


I hope you enjoy this as much as i did.  SEED, SEED, SEED 

Clean, good quality, as only you deserve!!

oH!  Did i say? ...... Seed, for at least 1:1 ratio.... more if you can, to keep it alive..Thanks

Squashydog  :)
